data.lyric:
[ti:SUN GOES DOWN]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:SUN GOES DOWN]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]SUN GOES DOWN - Lil Nas X
[00:03.68]Lyrics by：Montero Hill/Denzel Baptiste/Omer Fedi/David Biral/Roy Lenzo
[00:07.37]Composed by：Montero Hill/Denzel Baptiste/Omer Fedi/David Biral/Roy Lenzo
[00:11.05]I wanna run away
[00:13.35]Don't wanna lie I don't want a life
[00:16.51]Send me a gun
[00:18.12]
[00:19.08]And I'll see the sun
[00:20.87]
[00:22.22]I'd rather run away
[00:24.46]Don't wanna lie I don't want a life
[00:26.94]
[00:27.65]Send me a gun
[00:29.18]
[00:30.21]And I'll see the sun
[00:31.98]You need an instant ease
[00:35.58]
[00:36.15]From your life where you got plenty
[00:37.75]Of every hurt and heartbreak
[00:40.07]
[00:40.70]You just take it all to the face
[00:42.84]I know that you want to cry
[00:46.31]
[00:47.11]But there's much more to life than dying
[00:49.58]Over your past mistakes
[00:51.71]And people who threw dirt on your name
[00:53.89]
[00:55.60]Since ten I been feeling lonely
[00:58.36]Had friends but they was picking on me
[01:01.04]Always thinking why my lips so big
[01:03.45]Was I too dark can they sense my fears
[01:05.69]
[01:06.56]These gay thoughts would always haunt me
[01:09.37]I prayed god would take it from me
[01:12.04]It's hard for you when you're fighting
[01:14.75]And nobody knows it when you're silent
[01:17.44]I'd be by the phone
[01:19.42]Stanning Nicki morning into dawn
[01:22.05]Only place I felt like I belonged
[01:24.85]Strangers make you feel so loved you know
[01:27.27]
[01:27.89]And I'm happy by the way
[01:30.38]That I made that jump that leap of faith
[01:33.05]I'm happy that it all worked out for me
[01:35.24]
[01:35.82]Imma make my fans so proud of me
[01:38.53]Ohhh
[01:39.48]I wanna run away
[01:41.79]Don't wanna lie I don't want a life
[01:44.74]Send me a gun
[01:46.55]
[01:47.56]And I'll see the sun
[01:49.13]
[01:50.39]I'd rather run away
[01:52.73]Don't wanna lie I don't want a life
[01:55.82]Send me a gun
[01:57.53]
[01:58.46]And I'll see the sun
[02:00.19]You need an instant ease
[02:03.85]
[02:04.37]From your life where you got plenty
[02:06.44]Of every hurt and heartbreak
[02:08.90]You just take it all to the face
[02:11.17]I know that you want to cry
[02:14.75]
[02:15.42]But there's much more to life than dying
[02:17.73]Over your past mistakes
[02:19.91]And people who threw dirt on your name
[02:22.16]
[02:24.98]Oooohhh
[02:27.72]Hoooahh
[02:29.68]
[02:30.38]Unooooh
data.trans:
[ti:SUN GOES DOWN]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:SUN GOES DOWN]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.68]//
[00:07.36]//
[00:11.05]我想要逃离
[00:13.35]不想说谎 我对人生失去希望
[00:16.51]送我一把枪
[00:18.12]
[00:19.08]我会看见灿烂阳光
[00:20.87]
[00:22.22]我宁愿逃离
[00:24.46]不想说谎 我对人生失去希望
[00:26.94]
[00:27.65]送我一把枪
[00:29.18]
[00:30.21]我会看见灿烂阳光
[00:31.98]你需要从生活里
[00:35.58]
[00:36.15]得到片刻的安逸 这压抑的生活
[00:37.75]给你造成很多痛苦和伤心
[00:40.07]
[00:40.70]你只是默默地接受一切
[00:42.84]我知道你想大哭一场
[00:46.31]
[00:47.11]但比起死亡 人生还有很多意义
[00:49.58]为那些曾经犯下的过错
[00:51.71]亦或是拼命诋毁你的人付出生命 值吗？
[00:53.89]
[00:55.60]从十岁开始 我一直感到孤独
[00:58.36]尽管我朋友 但是他们故意刁难我
[01:01.04]我总是在想我的嘴唇为什么这么厚
[01:03.45]我的皮肤是不是太黑了 他们能否感觉到我的恐惧
[01:05.69]
[01:06.56]这些稀奇古怪的想法总是萦绕在我心头
[01:09.37]我祈求上帝将这一切从我身边带走
[01:12.04]当你奋力抗争时 一切都艰难无比
[01:14.75]当你沉默不语时 无人知晓
[01:17.44]我会守在电话旁
[01:19.42]我是Nicki Minaj粉丝 从清晨到黎明
[01:22.05]我唯一能够找到归属感的地方
[01:24.85]陌生人让你感觉自己被爱包围着 你是否明白
[01:27.27]
[01:27.89]顺便说一句 我很高兴
[01:30.38]我勇敢迈出一步 做出信仰之跃
[01:33.05]我很高兴 所有难题都迎刃而解
[01:35.24]
[01:35.82]我要让我的歌迷为我感到骄傲
[01:38.53]//
[01:39.48]我想要逃离
[01:41.79]不想说谎 我对人生失去希望
[01:44.74]送我一把枪
[01:46.55]
[01:47.56]我会看见灿烂阳光
[01:49.13]
[01:50.39]我宁愿逃离
[01:52.73]不想说谎 我对人生失去希望
[01:55.82]送我一把枪
[01:57.53]
[01:58.46]我会看见灿烂阳光
[02:00.19]你需要从生活里
[02:03.85]
[02:04.37]得到片刻的安逸 这压抑的生活
[02:06.44]给你造成很多痛苦和伤心
[02:08.90]你只是默默地接受一切
[02:11.17]我知道你想大哭一场
[02:14.75]
[02:15.42]但比起死亡 人生还有很多意义
[02:17.73]为那些曾经犯下的过错
[02:19.91]亦或是拼命诋毁你的人付出生命 值吗？
[02:22.16]
[02:24.98]//
[02:27.72]//
[02:29.68]
[02:30.38]//
